body: The new milf is hot, sure, but the story has still gone to shit if he just accepts giving up the other milf like that. We had 3 volumes of getting invested in their relationship and then it gets cut off in one page with basically no explanation? Fuck that. He needs to take the other milf back and make a harem; unfortunately closest we'll get is probably gonna be some stupid swapping bullshit down the line instead. Fucking ridiculous that he just said okay and let the other milf go

I was excited when the milf get revealed last chapter. The mommy is so hot! So kind of disappoint by the presentation and how long it take for them to go all in! 
Hopefully English trans and the others chap doesn’t take to long.
Hyji is the man when it comes to drawing milfs
